# MARAUDER Medium Energy Cannon
An [color=MediumVioletRed]energy[/color] plasma launcher that fires explosive, slow-moving globs of plasma to damage and ignite enemy ships.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson]30 RPM[/color] ([color=deepskyblue]0.5 RPS[/color]) - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]2500 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]180 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]600m[/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]500u/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]350u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]500u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Single Shot[/color]
